body:
I set a non-exist image in rc and watch event.

```
kubectl run my-nginx --replicas=2 --image=ngixn --port=80
kubectl get event -w
```

kubelet is supposed to throw failed pull event and actually we get failed pull event. But I noticed there is an "successfully pulled image" event.

```
3s          3s         1         my-nginx         ReplicationController                                       SuccessfulCreate   {replication-controller }   Created pod: my-nginx-tkigj
3s          3s         1         my-nginx-tkigj   Pod                                                         Scheduled          {scheduler }                Successfully assigned my-nginx-tkigj to 127.0.0.1
3s          3s         1         my-nginx-p70z0   Pod                                                         Scheduled          {scheduler }                Successfully assigned my-nginx-p70z0 to 127.0.0.1
3s          3s         1         my-nginx         ReplicationController                                       SuccessfulCreate   {replication-controller }   Created pod: my-nginx-p70z0
2s          2s         1         my-nginx-p70z0   Pod                     spec.containers{my-nginx}           Pulling            {kubelet 127.0.0.1}         pulling image "ngixn"
2s          2s         1         my-nginx-tkigj   Pod                     spec.containers{my-nginx}           Pulling            {kubelet 127.0.0.1}         pulling image "ngixn"
2s          2s         1         my-nginx-tkigj   Pod                     implicitly required container POD   Pulled             {kubelet 127.0.0.1}         Container image "beta.gcr.io/google_containers/pause:2.0" already present on machine
2s          2s         1         my-nginx-tkigj   Pod                     implicitly required container POD   Created            {kubelet 127.0.0.1}         Created with docker id d07e749fa273
2s          2s         1         my-nginx-tkigj   Pod                     implicitly required container POD   Started            {kubelet 127.0.0.1}         Started with docker id d07e749fa273
2s          2s         1         my-nginx-p70z0   Pod                     implicitly required container POD   Pulled             {kubelet 127.0.0.1}         Container image "beta.gcr.io/google_containers/pause:2.0" already present on machine
2s          2s         1         my-nginx-p70z0   Pod                     implicitly required container POD   Created            {kubelet 127.0.0.1}         Created with docker id 4fefe0069769
2s          2s         1         my-nginx-p70z0   Pod                     implicitly required container POD   Started            {kubelet 127.0.0.1}         Started with docker id 4fefe0069769
FIRSTSEEN   LASTSEEN   COUNT     NAME             KIND      SUBOBJECT                   REASON    SOURCE                MESSAGE
0s          0s         1         my-nginx-tkigj   Pod       spec.containers{my-nginx}   Failed    {kubelet 127.0.0.1}   Failed to pull image "ngixn": Error: image library/ngixn:latest not found
0s        0s        1         my-nginx-tkigj   Pod       spec.containers{my-nginx}   Back-off   {kubelet 127.0.0.1}   Back-off pulling image "ngixn"
0s        0s        1         my-nginx-p70z0   Pod       spec.containers{my-nginx}   Failed    {kubelet 127.0.0.1}   Failed to pull image "ngixn": Error: image library/ngixn:latest not found
```

title: get successfully pulled event when pull  non-exist image
